Drinks.name: Margarita
Drinks.recipe: Combine the tequila, lime juice, orange liqueur, and a few ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. (Or alternately if you do not have a cocktail shaker, you can stir the ingredients together in a measuring cup or shake them together in a mason jar.

Drinks.name: Mojito
Drinks.recipe: Mint sprigs muddled with sugar and lime juice. Rum added and topped with soda water. Garnished with sprig of mint leaves. Served with a straw.

Drinks.name: Moscow Mule
Drinks.recipe: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a copper mug or highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently and garnish with a lime slice.

Drinks.name: Pina Colada
Drinks.recipe: Mix with crushed ice until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

Drinks.name: Long Island Ice Tea
Drinks.recipe: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon spiral. Serve with straw.

Drinks.name: Miami Vice
Drinks.recipe: In a blender, add 1 ounce of the rum, strawberries, lime juice, simple syrup and 1 cup crushed ice and blend until smooth.Pour into a hurricane glass and set in the freezer.

Drinks.name: Martini
Drinks.recipe: Pour gin and vermouth into a mixer with ice cubes, stir Strain into a chilled martini glass Garnish with an olive or lemon twist

Drinks.name: Old Fashioned
Drinks.recipe: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and cover in bitters Add a teaspoon of water, muddle until sugar cube dissolved Fill glass with ice, add whiskey Garnish with orange slice or cherry

Drinks.name: Mimosa
Drinks.recipe: Pour Champagne in Champagne flute Add orange juice Garnish with orange slice

Drinks.name: Daiquiri
Drinks.recipe: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes, shake Strain into chilled cocktail glass Garnish with lime twist or wedge

Drinks.name: Negroni
Drinks.recipe: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice cubes, stir Strain into rocks glass full of ice Garnish with orange peel

Drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
Drinks.recipe: Pour vodka, cranberry juice, Cointreau, and lime juice into a shaker with ice cubes, shake Strain into cocktail glass Garnish with lime or lemon wheel

Drinks.name: Martini
Drinks.recipe: - 3 oz gin or vodka - .5 oz dry vermouth - Lemon peel or olive
